org.nodex.java.core.stdio

Class InStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nodex.java.core.stdio.InStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadStream

    public class InStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReadStream

    An asynchronous wrapper around a InputStream

    Author:
    Tim Fox

    • Method Detail

      • dataHandler

        public void dataHandler(Handler<Buffer> handler)
        Set a data handler. As data is read, the handler will be called with the data.
        Specified by:
        dataHandler in interface ReadStream

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause the ReadStream. After calling this, the ReadStream will aim to send no more data to the dataHandler
        Specified by:
        pause in interface ReadStream

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Resume reading. If the ReadStream has been paused, reading will recommence on it.
        Specified by:
        resume in interface ReadStream

      • endHandler

        public void endHandler(Handler<java.lang.Void> endHandler)
        Set an end handler. Once the stream has ended, and there is no more data to be read, this handler will be called.
        Specified by:
        endHandler in interface ReadStream

      • exceptionHandler

        public void exceptionHandler(Handler<java.lang.Exception> handler)
